column3: Well done ladies well done rapha i woke up with almost same weather in black forest .amazing scenery wonderfull sound.rapha is always in the point with extreme weather videos and i just love them!!!
There is no other sport like cycling who gives your life and at the finish line you killed it
Killer video. The essence of cycling is in just 1:30. You were able to put everything in just a minute. Well done
Wish Rapha did the yellow jacket with black band for men. Get on it rapha! And before you say it- I've seen the hardshell :)
